702084f-a.text:
West Fordham Road (running from extreme left center to center background), east from Cedar Ave., then north to Sedgwick Ave. The thoroughfare makes a sharp turn northward at Hampden Place. Also shown (foreground) is the west side of Cedar Ave. running north from West 182nd Street to West
Fordham Road.
1917.
Gift of E.M. Jenks.
702084f-a.folder: Fordham Road (West) & Cedar Avenue, Bronx, NY
